item.title: Republican States Can Move Ahead With Abortion Pill Lawsuit in Texas
item.description: Three Republican-led states can go forward with their lawsuit that seeks to restrict the availability of the abortion pill mifepristone, a judge ruled...

item.title: WPA Intelligence Poll: Kemp Leads Osoff in Ga.'s US Senate Race
item.description: Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp, a Republican, leads Sen. Jon Osoff, D-Ga., in a hypothetical U.S. Senate matchup in 2026, according to a new poll.

item.title: Report: VP Harris Miffed at Biden's Election Boast
item.description: Joe Biden's recent remarks that he could have beaten President-elect Donald Trump in the Nov. 5 election reportedly have strained the relationship bet...

item.title: Sen. Cruz Reintroduces No Tax on Tips Act
item.description: Sen. Ted Cruz, R-Texas, on Thursday reintroduced a bill that would exempt tips from federal taxes.

item.title: Rep. Zinke to Newsmax: Burgum, Trump Noms 'Enormously Talented'
